text: @TeamTrump @realDonaldTrump @realDonaldTrump if you don’t like the press questioning your poor handling of the Coronavirus pandemic, stop holding your press conferences. The job of the press is not to pat you on the back, it’s to hold you accountable for your, in this case, inactions. #TrumpPressBriefing https://t.co/C4KnSzsZgD

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
